metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14990 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: WordPress 4.8.2 stores cleartext wp_signups.activation_key values (but stores the analogous wp_users.user_activation_key values as hashes), which might make it easier for remote attackers to hijack unactivated user accounts by leveraging database read access (such as access gained through an unspecified SQL injection vulnerability).

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-2').
